title: Process compensation controls fcs files into flowSet.
author: Dillon Hammill
date: August 27, 2020
output_format: html_document
vignette: >
  %\VignetteIndexEntry{Process compensation controls fcs files into flowSet.}
  %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown}
  \usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(CytoExploreR)
library(gtools)

files <- mixedsort(list.files(system.file("extdata/Compensation", package = "CytoExploreRData"), full.names = TRUE))
Compensation <- read.flowSet(files)

# Markers
chnls <- c("Alexa Fluor 405-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 430-A",
          "APC-Cy7-A", "PE-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 488-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 700-A",
          "Alexa Fluor 647-A",
          "7-AAD-A")
markers <- c("Hoechst-405",
            "Hoechst-430",
            "CD11c",
            "Va2",
            "CD8",
            "CD4",
            "CD44",
            "CD69")
names(markers) <- chnls
markernames(Compensation) <- markers
```
